title: Execute GitHub Repo Rename to claude-golem
description: Use gh CLI to rename the GitHub repository from ralphtools to claude-golem, then update local git remote.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Verify gh auth status is working
Run: gh repo rename claude-golem (from ralphtools directory)
Update local git remote: git remote set-url origin <new-url>
Verify git remote -v shows new claude-golem URL
Test git fetch works with new remote
Verify old URL redirects to new (GitHub auto-redirect)
